description: This Dart source file defines the `ReaderScreen` widget for a Flutter-based book reader app. It manages the UI for reading a book, including font size, theme mode (dark/light), bookmarks, and page navigation. It interacts with the `ReaderService` to handle book data and user reading state.

classes.name: ReaderScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the reading interface, allowing users to read a book with controls for theme, font size, bookmarks, and navigation.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the ReaderScreen widget.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes the reader service, loads the book passed via route arguments, and syncs font size and theme mode.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Saves reading progress when the widget is disposed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the reading screen, including header actions, page display, and controls for font size and page navigation.
